title: Friday Night 40K — Open Play
description: Casual open play night. All points levels welcome. Tables provided.

title: Saturday Age of Sigmar League
description: Week 3 of the winter league. Bring your 2000pt list.

title: 40K Tournament — 2000pts
description: Valentine's Day 40K! 3 rounds, ITC scoring. $10 entry. Prizes for top 3.

title: Bolt Action Open Play
description: Grab a table and push some WW2 models around. All eras welcome.

title: Friday Night 40K
description: Competitive and casual tables. Sign up on Discord to reserve a spot.

title: Old World Escalation League — Round 4
description: 1500pts this week. Painting progress check — 3 colors minimum to play.

title: Flames of War Intro Night
description: Never played Flames of War? Come learn! Loaner armies available.

title: Kings of War Monthly — February
description: Monthly get-together for KoW fans. Bring 2000pts, any army.

title: 40K Narrative Campaign — Session 5
description: Ongoing narrative campaign. Registered players only. Contact the store to join.

title: AoS Path to Glory — Week 6
description: Final week of the Path to Glory campaign. Grand finale battle!
